title: Abaseen Writers Association condoles over death of PIOâ€™s father
content:
PESHAWAR, Jul 21 (APP): President Abaseen Column Writers Association, Zia ul Haq Sarhadi has expressed his grief and sorrow over the sad demise of Ghulam Sabir, father of Principal Information Officer (PIO) Information Department, Mubashir Hassan.
In a condolence message here Sunday, Zia-ul-Haq Sarhadi conveyed his grief over the death of Ghulam Sabir who was a senior citizen and has served on important posts during his service.
President Abaseem Column Writers Association also offered special prayers for the rest of the departed soul and grant of patience for bereaved family members.
Zia said the whole cabinet and members of Abaseen Colum Writers Association are with the family members of late Ghulam Sabir at this difficult time.
